canonicalsolution

Class PRQuadtree.InternalNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • canonicalsolution.PRQuadtree.Node
      • canonicalsolution.PRQuadtree.InternalNode
  • Enclosing class:
    PRQuadtree

    public class PRQuadtree.InternalNode
extends PRQuadtree.Node
    Represents an internal node of a PR Quadtree.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public PRQuadtree.Node add(City city,
                  java.awt.geom.Point2D.Float origin,
                  int width,
                  int height)
        Description copied from class: PRQuadtree.Node
        Adds a city to the node. If an empty node, the node becomes a leaf node. If a leaf node already, the leaf node becomes an internal node and both cities are added to it. If an internal node, the city is added to the child whose quadrant the city is located within.
        Specified by:
        add in class PRQuadtree.Node
        Parameters:
        city - city to be added to the PR Quadtree
        origin - origin of the rectangular bounds of this node
        width - width of the rectangular bounds of this node
        height - height of the rectangular bounds of this node
        Returns:
        this node after the city has been added

      • remove

        public PRQuadtree.Node remove(City city,
                     java.awt.geom.Point2D.Float origin,
                     int width,
                     int height)
        Description copied from class: PRQuadtree.Node
        Removes a city from the node. If this is a leaf node and the city is contained in it, the city is removed and the node becomes a leaf node. If this is an internal node, then the removal command is passed down to the child node whose quadrant the city falls in.
        Specified by:
        remove in class PRQuadtree.Node
        Parameters:
        city - city to be removed
        origin - origin of the rectangular bounds of this node
        width - width of the rectangular bounds of this node
        height - height of the rectangular bounds of this node
        Returns:
        this node after the city has been removed

      • getChild

        public PRQuadtree.Node getChild(int quadrant)
        Gets the child node of this node according to which quadrant it falls in
        Parameters:
        quadrant - quadrant number (top left is 0, top right is 1, bottom left is 2, bottom right is 3)
        Returns:
        child node

        public java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Float getChildRegion(int quadrant)

        Returns:
        rectangular region for this child node
